briefTitle: Effect of Vitamin D Treatment in Primary Hyperparathyroidism

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* P-Ca-ion \> 1,30 mmol/l
* P-PTH \> 5 pmol/l
* P-OH25-vitamin D \< 80 nmol/l

Exclusion Criteria:

* P-creatinin \> 120 mumol/l
* usage of Etalpha, Mimpara
* Cancer
* Sarcoidosis
* malabsorption
* pancreatitis
* alcohol abuse
* pregnancy

outcomeMeasures.title: Decrease in Preoperative P-PTH
outcomeMeasures.description: Decrease in plasma PTH after 25 weeks of preoperative vitamin D treatment compared with the plasebo Group.

outcomeMeasures.title: Increase in Trabecular and Cortical vBMD Measured by QCT and pQCT of Hip, Spine and Forearm
